channel.title: How to get this to work

item.title: How to get this to work
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I did the last two for you for examples.

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt) { String cmd = evt.getActionCommand(); try { if (cmd != null) { if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("exit")) { System.exit(0); } if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Forums")) { Runtime runtime=Runtime.getRuntime(); Process p = runtime.exec("internet explorer http://www.fallenforums.tk"); } if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Vote @ Mopar")) { openUpWebsite("http//google.com"); } if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Vote @ google")) { openUpWebsite("http//google.com"); } }

Read full topic

Well i want when u click anny of those u redirret u to the site public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt) { String cmd = evt.getActionCommand(); try { if (cmd != null) { if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("exit")) { System.exit(0); } if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Forums")) { Runtime runtime=Runtime.getRuntime(); Process p = runtime.exec("internet explorer http://www.fallenforums.tk"); } if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Vote @ Mopar")) { System.out.println("Not working atm"); } if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Vote @ Runelocus")) { System.out.println("Not working atm"); } }
